title: Togainu no Chi Volume 4
description: Developments in the murky world of Toshima escalate as the participants of Igura obsessively seek out the addictive 50% Pure Line. What path will Akira take after witnessing the grotesque aftermath of a bloody massacre while constantly being hunted by Takeru, who is more savagely deluded and intoxicated with each encounter? And to what twisted lengths will disheartened Keisuke go in order to prove himself to Akira? As old mysteries unravel, it becomes apparent there is no hope for change, much less survival.
author: Suguro Chayamachi
